Key Match Events: Eric Wagaman scored on Jordyn Adams' infield hit in the 13th inning, giving the Angels a 4-3 victory against the Sox.
Andrew Vaughn homered in the fourth for the game's first run.
Taylor Ward tied the game in the eighth with an RBI single.
Gustavo Campero tied the game with a run-scoring single in the bottom of the 10th.
Andrew Benintendi's two-out RBI single put the Sox ahead in the 11th.
Eric Wagaman's RBI single tied the game again in the 11th.
Yoán Moncada struck out with the bases loaded in the 13th inning.
Jordyn Adams hit a walk-off infield single in the 13th inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Interim manager Grady Sizemore commented, 'We had some opportunities, just didn’t capitalize on them. We just came up short.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sox have 117 losses, three shy of tying the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses in a season during the modern era.
Jake Eder made his major-league debut, allowing one run on two hits with one strikeout and one walk in two innings.
Chad Kuhl avoided a run-scoring balk by delivering a clean pitch despite stumbling.
